# Chapter 1: Import 

## Exercise 1
```{r}
penguins <- read_delim(file = "data/penguins_raw.tsv",
                       delim = "\t")
```


## Exercise 2
```{r}
penguins <- read_delim(file = "data/penguins_raw.tsv",
                       delim = "\t",
                       col_types = cols(`Date Egg` = col_date(format = "%d/%m/%Y")))
```
